bike.description: OCLV® 120 Carbon is unusually light, strong, and fast. Pro Race Geometry improves handling. The same stock frame ridden by the USPS team in the Tour de France.
original_paints: Frameset available in Blue Dusk/Bright Silver (USPS Team)

components.description: Bontrager Race Lite, OCLV 110 Carbon, 1-1/8" aluminum steerer tube, aluminum crown

Bontrager Race Lite: 23mm semi-deep front rim provides excellent aero; 21mm rear rim w/OSB improves lateral rigidity, prolongs wheel life; Fully serviceable Swiss-made rear hub w/cartridge and needle bearings; Cro-Moly skewers; Stiff, 14G bladed spokes; 7
Selle San Marco Era Luxe, Cro-Moly rails
